item.title: Beyond Concorde: One man’s quest to bring back supersonic travel becomes reality
item.description: When British Airways retired its Concorde fleet in 2003, few imagined that would be the demise of supersonic passenger travel for the foreseeable futu...

item.title: Tech leaders at Anthropic, IBM, and Meta warn that AI is coming for software developer jobs
item.description: While AI is set to transform the field of software development, executives disagree on the timing and scale.

item.title: Couples most likely to divorce share a common economic trait, research shows
item.description: Female breadwinners represent just 16% of all U.S. households—but account for 42% of divorces

item.title: Amid Trump’s latest tariff threats, the S&P 500 tumbles into correction territory just three weeks after smashing record highs
item.description: The index dipped 1.4%, while the Nasdaq Composite and the Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 2% and 1.3%, respectively, on Thursday.

item.title: U.S. household net worth climbed to record at end of 2024
item.description: However, stocks have mostly reversed course in recent weeks, wiping out $5 trillion in gains.
